bucket.title: Storage bucket
bucket.description: Storage bucket where the result will be uploaded. (i.e. in.c-bing-ex)

accountId.title: Account ID
accountId.description: Account identifier. (if left empty, all accounts are downloaded)

sinceLast.description: Continue download from last state (retrieves data since last download was perfomed)

customerId.title: Customer ID
customerId.description: Customer identifier of your BingAds account.

bulkRequests.title: Bulk Request Objects
bulkRequests.description: List of datasets to retrieve from Bulk Service

type.title: Endpoint
type.description: Fetch data from given date range. i.e. Products, Customers, Orders

pkey.title: Pkeys
pkey.description: Names of primary key columns. (Specify if load mode is set to Incremental)

columns.title: Columns
columns.description: List of supported columns according to report type. Leave empty to fetch all available columns.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Date from which to retrieve data in format: dd-mm-yyyy. If sinceLast is set, this boundary is considered only the first time extractor runs.

incremental.title: Storage upload mode
incremental.description: Incremental upload will append data to existing tables. Full upload will replace the contents of target table.

completeData.title: Return complete data only
completeData.description: Determines whether you want the service to generate the report only if all the data has been processed and is available. If true, the request fails if the system has not finished processing all the data based on the aggregation, scope, and time period values that you specify.

reportPeriod.title: Report Period
reportPeriod.description: (optional) Time period of report data. (Overrides the 'Start Date' parameter) NOTE: If you are reporting on multiple accounts the timezone considered may differ from what you expect see documentation
